titleStmt.title: Vindici√¶ veritatis or an unanimous attestation to Gods blessed truth revealed in his vvord: together with a serious protestation against those church-desolating and soul-damning errors, heresies, and blasphemies, which of late have come in like a flood upon our county and kingdome : especially against a toleration of them. / Made in pursuance of the nationall Covenant, by the ministers of the Gospel within the West-Riding of the countie of York, as a caution to their flocks, and testimonie to the world of their zeal for, and love to, Christs truth and church. Readily and willingly subscribed, April 6. 1648.
titleStmt.author: Hill, Edward, 1589 or 90-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock, for Luke Favvne, at the sign of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Edward Hill minister of the Gospel at Creston [and 40 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
